Docs.param: The last response received over the connection.
the context in which the connection is being used.
Docs.summary: Returns the duration of time which this connection can be safely kept idle.

remarks.para:
Returns the duration of time which this connection can be safely kept idle. If the connection is left idle for longer than this period of time, it MUST not reused. A value of 0 or less may be returned to indicate that there is no suitable suggestion.
When coupled with a , if {@link ConnectionReuseStrategy#keepAlive(HttpResponse, HttpContext) returns true, this allows you to control how long the reuse will last. If keepAlive returns false, this should have no meaningful impact
